title: Marginal cost rising, marginal product falling

content.question: Assume that labor is the only variable input. If a firmâ€™s short-run marginal cost is increasing as output rises, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: Average product of labor is constant.
Average product of labor is increasing.
Marginal product of labor is greater than average product of labor.
Marginal product of labor is decreasing.
Total product of labor is decreasing.

content.answer: Marginal product of labor is decreasing.
